name: Meat Juggler
description:
If you think you know how to cook meat on the Barbecue, you're about to learn once again!

Flip? What are you, a wimp? Just juggle 'em in the air, and make sure they don't fall in the dirt!

In this physics cooking game, you will become a true Barbecue dad!

P - Pause the game

For optimal gameplay, press F11 followed by CTRL - R to play in fullscreen
